name: sredni
text: I love how Ray leans against the chair, all dissing down Beef's choice of AM radio.

name: dovey
text: I'm assuming the car doesn't have an FM receiver, due to it's age.

name: starch
text: A comment left by starch was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by symbolsoup, pwb, overgrowth, wurlitzergirl, Jar, Madoushi)

name: mirzabah
text: Five AM-listening, self-respecting men felt you did not respect them.

name: theguitarhero
text: Six now.

name: kennisiou
text: It's the same way he leans against the seat when he's upset with Beef for dodging his questions .

name: centipede_damascus
text: Why does the Santa not sing a more seasonal tune?

name: ssddr
text: Probably because theres no seasonal dance of christmas, and the twist would be easy to approximate with simple motors.

name: stuart
text: Jingle Bell Rock? Rockin' Around the Christmas Tree?

name: crinklebat
text: My godparents' Dancing Santa sings Jingle Bell Rock, just as a corroborating data point.

name: spinynorman
text:
I feel there is a viable market for holiday figurines who dance to alternative music, such as Tom Waits's "Goin' Out West" or Nick Cave's "The Mercy Seat."

COME ON BE REAL WITH ME BABY

name: madnes
text: Coincidentally, the lyrics of "The Mercy Seat" exactly summarise my feelings towards Christmas and the animatronic horrors it brings.

name: selbencoirlo
text: SANTA DON'T NEED NO MAKEUP, HE HAS REAL SCARS; HE'S GOT HAIR ON HIS CHEST, HE LOOKS GOOD WITHOUT A SHIRT.

name: charchar
text: "Twist & Shout" knows no season.

name: cailetshadow
text: Because santa's polyvinyl vestments were stitched by sleepless, hopeless Vietnamese widows onto a generic armature of Japanese-soldered and Cambodian-assembled hip-shakin' plastic that was programmed to blare out "American Song Number 7"?

name: tinhand
text:
Why is there not a seasonal dance of Christmas?
For $50 he could have bought a CD or perhaps brought some music with him for the road. But this is Ray we're talking about.

name: red_dawn
text: Maybe Ray is stupid with his money.

name: zedpower
text: A little.

name: cailetshadow
text: A lot

name: johnnygeo
text: yeah, well maybe *you* and *I* should lose some weight

name: tomsonlocal
text: "Be real with me baby" is too often overlooked as a phrase to use when one is attempting to barter successfully to obtain a product and/or service.

name: riazm
text: Whenever I need something from a woman I implore her to be real with me.

name: lowtrees
text: Beef really does flinch when he sees people making a mistake.

name: ham_shoes
text: He can see it coming in panel 2.

name: dancemanleo
text: i have one of those santa things and its the most goddamn annoying thing on the face of the planet, do not put that within a 10 mile radius of anyone under the age of 5 as the thing will never stop going off. i hate twist and shout santa

name: dancemanleo
text: and its a cover of twist and shout thats christmas themed, thats what makes it festive

name: theirateturk
text: lol @ it belonging to the manager's mother

name: tasteful
text: Man Ray

name: tasteful
genequagmire
text: Man Ray should indeed not purchase such a thing.  Unless he wished to take a photograph of it.
